SELECT SI_SALARY_ID, MS_SI_SALARY_ID, MS_SENIN_ID,
KIND, START_DATE, END_DATE,
HYOREI, HYOREI_ALLOWANCE,
MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_SALARY_ID, EXPERIENCE, RANK_ALLOWANCE,
BASIC_SALARY, UNION_DUES,
QUALIFICATION_ALLOWANCE, SHARED_REMARKS, FISCAL_YEAR_REMARKS,
USER_KEY, DATA_NO, DELETE_FLAG, SEND_FLAG, VESSEL_ID, RENEW_USER_ID, RENEW_DATE, TS
FROM SI_SALARY
WHERE DELETE_FLAG = 0
AND ( (START_DATE < :END_DATE AND END_DATE >= :START_DATE) OR (START_DATE < :END_DATE AND END_DATE IS NULL) )
AND ( START_DATE <= :START_DATE AND (END_DATE >= :START_DATE OR END_DATE IS NULL) )
AND ( END_DATE >= :END_DATE OR (START_DATE < :END_DATE OR END_DATE IS NULL) )

INSERT INTO SI_SALARY( SI_SALARY_ID, MS_SI_SALARY_ID,
MS_SENIN_ID, KIND, START_DATE, END_DATE , HYOREI, HYOREI_ALLOWANCE, MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_SALARY_ID, EXPERIENCE, RANK_ALLOWANCE,
BASIC_SALARY, UNION_DUES,
QUALIFICATION_ALLOWANCE, SHARED_REMARKS, FISCAL_YEAR_REMARKS,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :SI_SALARY_ID, :MS_SI_SALARY_ID,
:MS_SENIN_ID, :KIND, :START_DATE, :END_DATE, :HYOREI, :HYOREI_ALLOWANCE, :MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_SALARY_ID, :EXPERIENCE, :RANK_ALLOWANCE,
:BASIC_SALARY, :UNION_DUES,
:QUALIFICATION_ALLOWANCE, :SHARED_REMARKS, :FISCAL_YEAR_REMARKS,
:DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE SI_SALARY SET MS_SI_SALARY_ID = :MS_SI_SALARY_ID, MS_SENIN_ID = :MS_SENIN_ID, KIND = :KIND, START_DATE = :START_DATE, END_DATE = :END_DATE, HYOREI = :HYOREI, HYOREI_ALLOWANCE = :HYOREI_ALLOWANCE,
MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_SALARY_ID = :MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_SALARY_ID, EXPERIENCE = :EXPERIENCE, RANK_ALLOWANCE = :RANK_ALLOWANCE,
BASIC_SALARY = :BASIC_SALARY, UNION_DUES = :UNION_DUES,
QUALIFICATION_ALLOWANCE = :QUALIFICATION_ALLOWANCE, SHARED_REMARKS = :SHARED_REMARKS, FISCAL_YEAR_REMARKS = :FISCAL_YEAR_REMARKS,
DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE SI_SALARY_ID = :SI_SALARY_ID AND TS = :TS
